name: Guardian of the tower
description:
Very short browser text game created for the Only One of Any Asset (O2A2) jam.

Controls: w and s for navigating choices, e/x/space for selecting.

Features: No annoying sounds! (no sounds at all)

Up to 1000 words!

One background and one sprite!

Additional controls: b for backpack and you can click on item names to get a useless description
